column1: fullish outside off to start, shovelled towards midwicket for a single.
goes down leg for a wide. Loses his line. Good delivery to the right-hander
better. On a length around off, Parthiv defends back
tidy again from Bhuvi. Fuller than a good length outside off, fourth-stump line. Blocked to mid-off
good single. Full and straight, flicked towards mid-on for a quick single. Nabi fails to pick up cleanly.
good stuff. Brought third man up, and bowled a slow, straight legcutter. Skews off the outside half to short third man. Very game aware is Warner and the execution from Bhuvneshwar spot on
another legcutter on leg, clipped to square leg. A tidy over. Sunrisers' plan comes together in over 1.
fires one in on middle and leg, clipped to midwicket
quick and straight, pushed to mid-on for a quick single. Good tight single from Parthiv
lovely length. Simmons wants to tee off but the length isn't full enough. Pushed to cover

that's the result of some wily bowling. The pressure was built and Simmons misses a slog. It's full and straight again, no spin. A wild swing from Simmons is missed by some distance. Goes through a big gap between bat and pad, and hits middle stump. I'm not sure how he missed the ball by that much, and on the inside edge. Understandable if he was beaten on the outside edge, playing for some turn
full outside off, defended towards cover
beaten on the outside edge. Another tidy over this. Flat and wide outside off, Rana misses the ball on the outside edge.
good length delivery outside off, carved towards extra cover
that goes all the way. Shortish length outside off, there is some extra bounce but you can't afford to give Parthiv width. He gets underneath the length and nails his upper cut over point. Shot
better. Slower delivery outside off, pushed to mid-off for a run
finds the gap. That isn't great bowling. Good length delivery outside off, Rana taps the ball in the gap between short third man and backward point.
131 kph, a short loopy bouncer goes over Rana's head. Wide called
lovely stroke from Rana. Fullish delivery outside off, Rana drills a straight drive. Knew Warner was wide at mid-off so he hit this a lot straighter
another slower delivery that is closer to off, played quietly to backward point
flat delivery outside off, flat-batted over the bowler's head for a run. Again, not full enough to hit. Credit to Nabi
comes down the pitch. Nabi follows him. Off the pad. Skidding on with the arm
flat, but slower on off. Pushed to point. Good bowling. Varying his pace effectively
fuller delivery outside off, pushed to cover this time
a flat, slow delivery outside off. Rana looks for a dab to third man but makes no connection. Superb start from Nabi
almost goes through. Flat and straight, the ball skids on and skews to deep square leg off the inside edge

gets a wicket off the first ball. Rana goes. The pressure has built steadily and a loose shot the result. A shortish length outside off, Rana picks the length early but doesn't account for the pace of the surface. It hurries onto him and his pull lobs to mid-off.

dropped. Another dolly. What is happening? Short and wide outside off, an awful delivery. Parthiv can't keep his cut down either. Hits it straight to Vijay Shankar at point who puts his hands up for a reverse-cupped catch, but lets it through. Yikes, another one. Burst through his hands
on a length and straight, flicked away through midwicket
a slower ball on off, patted towards point.
too straight goes Kaul, flicked through square leg for a run
full and straight again, pushed away towards mid-on for a quick run
flat and wide, Parthiv stays back and slaps a cut past cover. Warner at long-off cuts it off
flat and wide outside off, Parthiv stays low and drags a sweep over midwicket. Probably the wrong shot but picked his area and executed well
shortish on off, worked down to fine leg
flat down leg, clipped to square leg
shortish and straight, Rohit punches a drive towards cover
quick and flat again, clipped to square leg. Good finish by Nabi. He's done his job

Parthiv has chipped a catch to long-on. That isn't good batting. A slower delivery outside off, Parthiv just chips the ball down towards long-on. Many fielders wouldn't have come close to that, but Warner attacked the ball, got there and took a classy low catch. Mumbai struggling
a good bouncer. Short on off and middle, hurries Rohit who pulls the ball over midwicket. Not quite timed but got enough of that
another couple. 140 kph, full and wide outside off. Crashed through cover for two more

another big appeal. A bouncer on middle and leg, Rohit misses a pull. The ball ricochets towards cover off the helmet. Umpire Padmanabhan has no idea what he's doing. He takes a step towards the leg umpire, then bails out. Warner comes up to him and says weren't you going to ask the other umpire? The umpire says no. Just helmet it looks like, the right call but no confidence at all. Rohit beaten for pace
a slower ball on middle and leg, a mis-timed slog finds mid-on
full and straight, towards leg stump. Flicked through midwicket for a couple
flat and slow outside off, defended
full and straight, worked to midwicket.
slow again through the air, a bit of spin. Clipped to midwicket. Another dot. Have to find the gaps. use your wrists
much better. Flat on off, Hardik opens the bat face to find a single to deep point.
punched towards deep cover from the back foot
shortish delivery on middle and leg, worked to square leg for a single. Hardik wants two, the captain says nah. Hardik scurries back. A lovely spell of disciplined bowling from Nabi.
flat delivery outside off, Hardik doesn't pick the legbreak. Beats the bat.
fullish delivery outside off, drilled wide of long-off for a single. Better intent from Hardik
beautifully played. Short and wide outside off, played late, played off the face of the bat, down past short third man. Using the pace
short and straight, flicked away towards midwicket
a googly outside off, Hardik cuts through backward point for a couple. Nicely played
another googly, Hardik doesn't pick this. Misses his flick and is struck in front of middle and leg. Going down
full on off, blocked to cover
runs at the bowler but the length is shorter outside off, slashed to deep point for a run
fantastic effort from Hooda. A slower delivery outside off, ramped over the keeper. Hooda runs to his left from third man to save a run. Awesome stuff, saved one
138 kph, fullish on off, pushed to long-off
140 kph, a yorker on middle, clipped to midwicket. Takes it on the full
a slower ball that is ill-directed. Drifts far too wide outside off. Wide called
a good short delivery to end, aimed outside off. Left alone. Hardik wears a rueful smile.
almost picks out deep square leg. Picks the length, not the variation. Reads it off the pitch, short on middle and leg. Pulled to deep square leg on the bounce
flat and wide, the legbreak. Beats the bat
flat outside off, another legbreak that rips past the outside edge
and one more. Flat and wide outside off, Hardik looks for a cut from the crease but the ball goes past
flat and wide, pushed to cover
deposits that over long-on's head. A slower ball outside off, Rohit gets down low and creams a swat over long-on. Fantastic stroke. A cross-batted shot, an indicator he wasn't quite picking Rashid
full delivery outside off, comes back in. Pushed to long-on
good length  on middle, nudged towards short fine leg for a run
good length outside off, hit to Henriques' left at cover. Rohit is sent back too late but his throw bounces over the stumps. Out with a direct hit
full and straight, pushed to long-on
a shortish slower ball outside off, dabbed towards cover
a short delivery outside off, sits up for Hardik but he can only swat a pull to long-on. Another tidy over from Sunrisers
a legcutter outside off from Bhuvi, punched on the up to the sweeper cover
another legcutter, so wary that he doesn't bowl it overly full. A shortish length is pulled to long-on on the bounce
a short slower ball outside off, hit towards long-off
129 kph, another legcutter outside off, off the outside edge down to short third man
that is good. Full and wide from Bhuvi, Rohit wanted to go over cover but the ball skews off the outside half and over backward point.
a short legcutter well outside off, Rohit dances down and drills a drive to long-off
nicely hit. A slower ball outside off from Henriques to start. Rohit gets underneath that and lifts the ball over cover. Nice execution
short and wide outside off, slashed to deep point. Pulled that length back on seeing Rohit advancing
good length and wide outside off, carved to deep point

to the other side of cover this time. That is experience and class. A shortish slower ball outside off, Rohit punches the ball off the back foot to the right of cover. Long-off can't get across either

brilliant batting. This is quick and short outside off, Rohit opens the bat face and guides the ball between backward point and third man. Yuvraj at backward point gets a hand on it but Bhuvi can't cut it in
on a length, worked to deep midwicket
shortish outside off, flicked to deep midwicket. Not a bad tactic to play Rashid out

taken this time. Moises' safe reverse-cupped hands. A flat delivery on middle and leg. He wasn't reading the legspinner so the sweep is the best option. But Hardik's slog results in a top edge which settles in cover's hands. Timely wicket
85 kph, short delivery outside off, stops on Rohit who pushes the ball back to the bowler
short again, flat. Punched to long-on
a googly on middle and leg, clipped to deep backward square leg
great stop. Flat and wide, carved towards short third man who dives to his right to save three.
full outside off, carved past backward point for a couple. The sweeper cover sweeps up
a low full toss on middle, pushed back to the bowler who deflects the ball into the stumps and then to long-on. Rohit brings up fifty
strays down leg for a wide
a slower ball on middle and leg, worked to deep square leg
short and wide, a poor delivery. Scythed towards backward point where Yuvraj stops the ball, but has done some damage to his little finger. The doctor comes out to check on him.
ooh, lucky. A full toss on the pads. Pollard misses out on five runs by missing his flick. Off the pad towards square leg
beautifully played. poor ball. A short delivery outside off, the ball sticks in the surface but third man is up so Rohit just lifts the ball over the keeper. Exceptional execution.
full and quick, off the outside edge to point for a run
flat and wide, carved to short third man. A loud 'noo' from Pollard
wow. Rohit goes for the reverse sweep and misses it by a pitch or two. Nowhere close
a googly outside off, cut towards short third man. Siraj dives to his left to save three more
quick and flat outside off, the ball spins past Pollard's edge. Sensational bowling
and another one. Wow. Sticks with his stock ball, the legbreak. Pollard has no idea which way this is going. The ball spins past the outside edge. Very tidy from Rashid.
looks for the yorker does Bhuvneshwar. Misses the length and it's a low full toss that is clipped through square leg. Played well
picks the gap and gets six. A short legcutter outside off, Rohit picks it. And pulls through midwicket. Superb stroke.
that's his best delivery, just stick with it. A low full toss on leg, worked to deep midwicket
another good yorker outside off. Shovelled to long-on for a run. Fantastic defensive bowling.
Rohit comes down, looking to convert that yorker into a full toss. He does so but can only find long-off with a drive
140 kph, drifts down leg for a wide. Naman can't collect cleanly. There are two extras
a yorker on leg, dug out towards cover where Rashid runs in and unnecessarily concedes a run with a fumble.

played onto his stumps. An awful delivery gets the wicket. It's short, it's wide, it's tripe. But Rohit picks the wrong shot. Looks to pull but the ball stops in the surface, comes on slower and takes his inside edge. And then disturbs the stumps. A fine, fine innings from the captain. Has looked classy all night.
full delivery, shaping away. The ball angles away and beats the bat. Lovely bowling.
good length delivery outside off, slapped away to deep cover. Just what he has to do, give Pollard the strike
eeeeks, a full toss on middle, flicked away to deep square leg. Should be hitting those for sixes.
another slower delivery, pace off. Superb bowling. The knuckle ball. Karn is too quick through his slog and the ball goes over the stumps. Bounces in front of Naman. So far, so good from Kaul
four to finish. A low full toss on middle, Karn opens the face of the bat and guides this through backward point for four. Not a great finish to a tidy over for Sunrisers

Bhuvneshwar wins this one. It's a not-so-good delivery. A full toss on middle, in the arc. Pollard swings and the ball is swatted straight to deep midwicket. Just struggled all night did Pollard. That swung back in the air, ending in the inside half of the bat and Shankar's hands, of course
a legcutter outside off, outside the tramline so he'll have to rebowl that
exceptional. The execution of the yorker can earn you millions. Bhuvneshwar doing it again. Harbhajan can only dig that out
another slower ball, the legcutter, the length isn't full so that Harbhajan can get underneath that. bounces in front of Naman and goes away for a couple of byes
another legcutter outside off, a flat-batted slap to long-off. Just one more. Great bowling

edged and gone. A short, slow delivery outside off. Karn looks for a cut but it just keeps shaping away. Ends up getting a thick edge to the keeper. Bowling outside the lower order's hitting arc, just fantastic execution again.
an offcutter outside off, swatted to wide long-on for a couple. Another tidy finish from Sunrisers
tossed up full outside off stump, Warner goes for the reverse sweep and is beaten. Patel flicks off the bails...but he's appealing to the umpire at the non-strikers for some reason. It's not given
short and wide outside off, he's quickly behind it and slaps this in front of cover point
back of a length, spinning away from outside off, but he bunts it to miwicket off the back foot, across the line
full at off stump, premeditated sweep, no connection at all. Barely gets the sticker of the bat, then boot, then slowly into the leg side
good length at middle stump, forward defence
full ball, fired flat at leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket

surely. Yes. Plumb in front. Warner's gone, we're going to have some chase now. This is full at middle stump, floats in and thuds Warner on the back leg as he looks to flick this. No doubt for Erasmus there...although replays suggest, vaguely, that there might have been a faint inside edge. There wasn't a dramatic reaction from Warner or anything. Tough to tell, other than the minute wave disturbance on the replay.
back of a length at off stump, swivels hurriedly and gets this to deep square with a short arm pull
good ball. The perfect yorker at off stump, he squeezes it out to extra cover
good length at off stump, defended to point on the up
good length, off stump, 142 kph. Pushed on the up into the cover region to steal a single
back of a length, angled into middle stump, pushed into the open midwicket area
good length, on the pads, flicked off his hips to deep square leg's right
good length at middle stump, flicked on the up to deep square leg
overpitched on the pads, flicked uppishly, but wide of, and, in front of deep square who cleans up on the bounce
good length at off stump, pushed on the up to extra cover's left

shot. He's exposing his leg stump in the stance before this ball. Probably to cut out the stride. And when Malinga bowls it full at middle, he doesn't need one. Gets to the pitch rapidly and drives it nicely, to mid-off's right
good length at middle stump, once more he doesn't need to make room, half a stride to push it on the up to mid-off's right
in the blockhole at leg stump, tucks it to short fine's left
back of a length at middle stump, goes back in the crease and punches it to long-on
gives him the charge, drives the length ball sweetly on the up to long-off
good length, just outside off stump, he goes back when he shouldn't have, squeezes it out to cover point...then sent back after running down the pitch without calling
back of a length at off stump, steps out and pushes straight to extra cover
flat, fast, back of a length, leg stump. He's back quickly and whips this to deep midwicket
good length, fired in at middle stump. Poked on the up to mid-on
good length at leg stump, flicked very late, past the midwicket area
good shot. Back of a length, just outside off stump. Stands tall and puts in a small stride, then punches on the up. Uses his wrists to get it between cover point and extra cover
nicely fielded. This good length ball skids through outside off, he slashes at this, gets it into the turf and point dives to his left to parry it
nicely done. Back of a length at middle stump, gets on top of the bounce quickly and spanks this pull shot in front of square with complete control
offcutter, back of a length outside off, steps out and pushes to short extra
offcutter, back of a length at off stump, punched off the back foot to mid-off
offcutter, dropped short outside off stump and Henriques only has to decide where to place this. In the end, he goes for the slice to get it well to the left of sweeper cover. Third man was inside
offcutter, full at off stump, driven firmly to sweeper cover
good length at off stump, driven on the up, straight to Pollard at short extra
legcutter this time, looped nicely, full at off stump. He tucks it off the toe-end to mid-on and steals a single

glorious shot, but straight to the fielder. Gives him the charge and thumps this length ball from middle stump with a straight bat. Lovely connection, hardly any placement. Mid-off puts in the barrier
back of a length, spinning in at off stump, chopped off the back foot to backward point
lovely. This is tossed up outside off stump, he skips down the wicket, gets to the pitch and picks this up with some balance over long-on
back of a length at middle stump, whipped off the back foot to deep midwicket

doesn't read the googly, but he's saved by the pad. He pushes at this anxiously as it pitches on leg and is almost beaten down the leg side whilst outside his crease. Safe in the end, it tickles off his pads to short  fine's right
back of a length at middle stump, punched off the back foot to long-on
googly again, pushed through flat, back of a length at off stump. Didn't seem to know about this either. Bunted into the off side hurriedly
back of a length, wide outside off stump, axed to sweeper cover
good length, angled into the pads, pushed on the up to midwicket
back of a length, angled in at leg stump, swivels and dispatches this to fine leg's left to bring up the fifty stand
slower ball, good length outside off stump, chops it onto his back leg as he pokes away from the body
good length, angled across off stump, and he leans into this gorgeously to push it on the up past mid-off. Pollard gives chase and pulls it back with a slide
poor bowling. Drops the offcutter short outside off stump, he just has to camp on the back foot and slash this past point
good length at leg stump. Poor bowling again. He'll nail that sweep most times, as he does now. Deep square had no chance
good length outside off stump, not to the pitch as he slashes. Beaten. arthiv took the bails off as Dhawan moved to balance himself. Replays show it's not out.
good length at middle stump, lets it spin and cops it on the pad
back of a length at middle stump, steps out, beaten in flight, pushes it back at the bowler

oh Dhawan. This is incredible. It was good bowling from Karn. He knew Dhawan was coming down the track, so he pushed this one wide, back of a length and beat him in flight. But Dhawan went after it, picked the turn and slapped this flat over long-on
googly outside off on a length this time. Dhawan wins the mind game. Stays on the back foot, opens the face and steals a single to short third man's right
good length, flat outside off from around the wicket, chopped to backward point

goes for the reverse sweep, doesn't control it, but finds the gap. This was back of a length at middle. He had turned quickly and went through with the shot. Hit it in the air, but safely in between backward point and short third
good length at middle stump, whipped off the back foot to deep square
flat and fast, back of a length at off stump. Pushed uppishly off the back foot, but it lands in front of the bowler
good length at off stump, gets on top of it, drives to long-off's left
good length at off stump, steps out and pats the ball gently to get it to long-on
offcutter, good length at leg stump, steps out and tickles it off the pads to fine leg
short ball at off stump, easy meal on the pitch, he's on top of it and pulls confidently to deep square

falls short of Harbhajan. Short ball again, this one rises more than the last and Henriques gets the pull high on the bat. He's late on it. It floats in front of Harbhajan and lands in front of him. Might have dived forward at some other point in his life
classy. For a second, he's beaten by Malinga's slower yorker. But he recovers, waits, makes it a full toss, and then lifts it over midwicket with a short arm jab
awful bowling. Short at off stump, he's waiting on the back foot and he dispatches this well to deep square's left with a pull
offcutter, short and wide outside off, mistimed cut to extra cover
back of a length at off stump, hangs back and whips it to deep midwicket
fired back of a length, flat at middle stump, pushed to long-on off the back foot
good length at middle stump, flicked into the leg side, easy peasy

dropped. This one carried to Harbhajan. Back of a length, he looked to punch this off the back foot and was through the shot too early. Hung back a nice catch to the bowler, who went down too late and didn't get his fingers under this
good length at middle stump, no feet this time, pokes away from the body, gets an inside edge to squeeze through to short fine
good length, outside off stump, plonks the front leg down to sweep, misses. Loud appeal but that hit him outside off

keep it slow, silly. Henriques through the shot early once more. This is full, an offcutter outside off. He goes for the short arm jab without any feet. The bat face closes too early and he balloons a leading edge to extra cover's right and he takes it comfortably. Henriques falls six short of his fourth fifty of the season.
offcutter, back of a length at middle stump, jumps at Dhawan and hits him in the midriff as he looks to flick this
good length, angled across off stump. Pokes this into the off side with an open face....and he's clutching this hand immediately.
back of a length at middle stump, he hops in his crease nervously and looks to close the face on this, gets a leading edge that lands in front of cover point
yikes. Bumrah is unforgiving. Bowls him a bouncer this time. He half hooks, half evades, fully takes it on the body
looks to slog this out of the city, misses. Back of a length, skids through across off stump before he can get his bat down
offcutter, back of a length outside off stump, cut to sweeper cover
full ball, aimed at off stump, gets the bat down just in time to keep it out and then...you guessed it, grimaces in pain
back of a length outside off stump, pushed to point off the back foot
offcutter, good length, down the leg side, he can't get bat on this but it is a wide
no problem here. Short ball at the hips, swivels and pulls it over square leg to find the boundary there
yorker outside off, arches backwards and looks to drive this through the off side, gets a thick inside edge that is too slow for deep midwicket to reduce to a single
back of a length, angled into him. He backs away and slaps this over the umpire, but not with enough timing to get the boundary. Long-on cuts it off
unfettered at the other end, Dhawan gets this length ball off his pads to fine leg
offcutter, good length at leg stump, flicks it to fine leg
yorker at the toes, flicked nicely to deep square...and that's his fifty
offcutter, full at off stump. Extends his arms and tries to hit this straight over the bowler, gets a thick outside edge that goes straight to sweeper cover
offcutter, good length at middle stump, defended into the off side off the front foot
good length at middle stump, steps out and pushes to extra cover
slower ball, full and wide outside off stump. He steps out and converts it into a full toss, pushes it down to long-off
good length, angled into the pads, classily flicked between deep square and fine leg
back of a length, angled in at off stump, dropped into the off side with soft hands
offcutter, full outside off stump, leans in and lifts the drive over extra cover. More a chip in the end, two more chopped down
back of a length outside off, pulled off the toe end to deep midwicket
yorker at off stump, gets the bat down quickly and squeezes this past point
slower ball, full toss outside off, tapped back to the bowler on the bounce
oh nice shot. This tails in at leg stump, overpitched, and he brings down a nice full face on this, with a high elbow and executes the perfect on-drive. Long-on is back though
bouncer down the leg side, he goes for the hook and misses. Parthiv takes it to his left and is already celebrating halfway through the appeal...umpire signals wide.
offcutter, back of a length outside off stump, opens the face and runs it down towards third man
offcutter at a length on leg stump, he steps out and doesn't get to the pitch. Flicks this but gets it high over mid-on, where Pollard runs back and tries to get one hand on it but it is too far
offcutter, good length at leg stump, flicked to fine leg
offcutter, full at off stump, driven down the ground, finds long-on
offcutter, back of a length outside off stump, dabs it to third man
full outside off stump, leans into it and drives it nicely past extra cover
good length outside off stump, leans in and slaps on the up to sweeper cover
back of a length, angled into the thigh, stands tall and glances it to fine leg
good length, angled down the leg side, glanced to short fine
full at leg stump, nicely behind it, full face of the bat again as he drives to long-on
yorker at off stump, dug out into the off side
lifts it over long-on to bring up the win. This is an offcutter, full at off stump, he waits for it and lifts it cleanly to the boundary at wide long-on where there's no fielder
